reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Design specs with TypeScript samples accelerate Engineering (L190/L195 validated again). Lesson: Research deliverables should have companion impl specs within 2 cycles ‚Äî methodology ages fast without code anchor.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Running full coverage audit at T-4 catches any drift before final Go/No-Go. Module-level analysis reveals coverage debt for Sprint 2 prioritization. Lesson: E2E tests provide functional verification but don't contribute to coverage metrics ‚Äî document this to avoid confusion when reviewing numbers.
